entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Red Earth Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:13 a.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then clearing. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:14 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:14 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
